Text: ok, i will take part in loading-seedeing at week. although die-release is bad...

I installed exactly as instructed (except using the torrent suggested). now when I try to run FEAR2.exe it gives me an error. This torrent corrupted my FEAR installation, if anyone might know the answer to this could you please help.
same thing happened to me... replaced FEAR2.exe, and it wouldn't work, then tried to revert back to the previous FEAR2.exe and Project Origin couldn't load... what a fucking waste...

Which one's real??? 
The picture says FEAR 2:Project Origin and the torrent says FEAR 2:Reborn...please get it clear...!!!

*** SOLUTION ***
1. Install F.E.A.R 2 (DIE edition)
2. Install F.E.A.R 2 Reborn (CPY, this edition).
3 Copy the FEAR2.EXE crack into the installed directory.
4. Download and install "http://nadolaboratories.com/fear2reborn.zip" into the F.E.A.R 2 Reborn folder.

Thanks to the team that provided a proper cracked Steam (F.E.A.R. 3)
